mapper.insert: insert into file (file_name, file_user_id, file_type, note, file_url, file_update_date, file_lesson_id, file_intro) values ( #{name}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url}, #{date}, #{lessonId}, #{intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
